title: Service Quality Practical Competency Enhancement: Machine Learning-Based Lead-Free Piezoelectric Ceramics Design Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: University-level linear algebra, probability theory, foundational machine learning, and basic materials science concepts
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Construction and evaluation of a machine learning model to predict the electrical properties (permittivity, dielectric loss) of piezoelectric ceramics.
Cultivation of the ability to solve multi-objective optimization problems using genetic algorithms (NSGA-II).
Analysis of the impact of CaTiO3 concentration changes on the dielectric properties of Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3-based ceramics.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
